name: Endless Space 2
description:
Installs Endless Space 2 into the default 64 bit Wine Steam prefix (ES2 is 64 bit only) and makes sure .NET Runtime 4.5.2 is preinstalled.
If necessary, add a recent wine version to your winesteam runner.
The installation process may block after installing .NET 4.5.2. Check the winetricks output to be sure that the installation process of .NET is successfull, then cancel the installation. The game should be correctly installed, but you may check the wine configuration.
content:
game:
  appid: 392110
  arch: win64
installer:
- task:
    app: dotnet452
    description: Installing .NET 4.5.2 Runtime...
    name: winetricks
    silent: false
winesteam:
  overrides:
    mscoree: b, n
    winegstreamer: disable
